Nigerian Security Printing and Minting Company Plc bụ onye na-ebi akwụkwọ ego na ụlọ ọrụ na-ebipụta ihe na Naijiria
Ọ dị na Abuja na Lagos ma bụrụ nke gọọmentị Naịjirịa nwere.
Na mgbakwunye na ibipụta akwụkwọ ego na akwụkwọ nzi ozi nke Nigeria, ọ kụdara ụfọdụ mkpụrụ ego Nigeria.  Ọ na-ebipụtakwa stampụ.

Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) bụ naanị onye na-enyefe ego nrịanrịa n'iwu n'ogbe niile Federation.  Ọ na-achịkwa olu nke ego na-enye ego na akụ na ụba iji hụ na nkwụsi ike nke ego na ọnụahịa.  Ngalaba Na-ahụ Maka Ọrụ Ego & Alaka nke CBN na-ahụ maka njikwa ego, site n'ịzụ ahịa, nkesa / mbubata, nhazi, iweghachi na mkpofu / nkwụsị nke akwụkwọ ego na mkpụrụ ego.
Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo wepụtara ụlọ ọrụ Mint na Febụwarị 2002 bụ ihe arụmụka, onye isi nchịkwa Sambo Dasuki gbara arụkwaghịm iji mee mkpesa.
N'afọ 2006, Gọvanọ Central Bank of Nigeria, Charles Chukwuma Soludo, kwara ụta na Naijiria bụ naanị obodo n'ụwa nwere ego mint mana ka na-ebubata ego, ma kwupụta na a na-aga n'ihu na-arụ ọrụ nkeonwe.
N'afọ 2010, a kọwara Chief Executive Mr
Emmanuel Ehidiamhen Okoyomon dị ka "na-awụlikwa elu n'ụrịa nke ji mara ntugharị nke Mint.".

Ka ọ na-erule n'ọnwa Febụwarị n'afọ 2015, "Naira na-ebipụta / na-emepụta mkpụrụ ego site na Nigerian Security Printing and Minting Plc (NSPM) Plc na ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ na-ebi akwụkwọ / na-ebipụ ihe na Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) na-ebipụtara".

Tọrọ ntọala na 1963 dị ka mmekọrịta dị n'etiti gọọmentị etiti nke Naijiria na De La Rue iji bipụta akwụkwọ ego, stampụ, akwụkwọ ozi na ikikere, Lindsay Parkinson wuru ụlọ ọrụ mbụ na Ahmadu Bello Way, Victoria Island. N'agbata afọ 1975 na 1980, n'oge mmụba mmanụ na Nigeria, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ gbasaa nke mere ka e nwee ngalaba pụrụ iche.
